channel.title: Skill Cape Requirements
channel.description:
I'm trying to make it so that I need lvl 99 to equip a skillcape. Any ideas? :confused: I already tried using:
[code]} else if (ItemName.endsWith("cape(t)")) { return 99;[/code]
but I added it under:
[code]else if (ItemName.endsWith("cape(t)")) { [/code]
so I'm guessing that you will need 99 attack/str instead?

item.title: Skill Cape Requirements
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

[quote=“pregg, post:8, topic:139747”][quote author=planplan link=topic=191772.msg1727263#msg1727263 date=1188789829]

} else if (ItemName.endsWith("cape(t)" && playerSkill[] { return 99;
[/quote] no…

else if (ItemName.endsWith("cape(t)" && (playerLevel[3] == 99) if your def(i think thats 3…) is 99 then you can wear it.

You could also do

else if (ItemName.endsWith("cape(t)" && (playerLevel[3] <= 98) {[/quote]

thanks alot

Read full topic

item.title: Skill Cape Requirements
item.dc:creator: @pregg pregg
item.description:
@pregg wrote:

[quote=“planplan, post:7, topic:139747”]} else if (ItemName.endsWith("cape(t)" && playerSkill[] { return 99;[/quote] no…

else if (ItemName.endsWith("cape(t)" && (playerLevel[3] == 99) if your def(i think thats 3…) is 99 then you can wear it.

You could also do

else if (ItemName.endsWith("cape(t)" && (playerLevel[3] <= 98) {

item.title: Skill Cape Requirements
item.dc:creator: @MonkeyMad MonkeyMad
item.description:
@MonkeyMad wrote:

[quote=“eagledude4, post:5, topic:139747”][quote author=pregg link=topic=191772.msg1726735#msg1726735 date=1188781508]
use &&playerSkill[]
[/quote]

?? can you give an example?[/quote]
something like this ( I GOT THIS FRMO GETCLDEF) if (playerLevel[[b]playerMagic[/b]] - CLMagic < 0) { sendMessage("You need " + CLMagic + " " + statName[playerMagic] + " to equip this item."); GoFalse = true;
the “playerMagic” is playerSkill i think ^^
